comments:
20060119-0800

I had the Synchronize view in Incoming Mode with Change Sets enabled. There was one incoming change with one changed .java file. I doubleclicked the file and then clicked the triangle left to the change set to collapse the whole tree.

=> Generic error message and this log entry:
